frontmatter.title: How to use Wii online?
frontmatter.excerpt: The Wii online service has been discontinued but there are alternatives.

pageProps.content:
## The problem

The Wii had two main services for online there was WiiConnect24 for games (ex: mario kart wii) and the Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection for channel (ex: weather channel). But in 2013 and 2014, both services were shutdown.

## The solution

Fortunately, there are alternatives to the Wii online service.

### Wiimmfi

Wiimmfi is a replacement for the Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection (the service that allows you to connect and play games online).

It was made by Wiimm a talented individual who monitored the official service before it went offline.

**Installing**

I suggest you follow the guide on [wii.guide](https://wii.guide/wiimmfi.html) because the process may change.
There are also other ways to install Wiimmfi, Ive chosen the Priiloader methode.

But here's a summery of the steps:

1. Download and install [Priiloader](https://hbb1.oscwii.org/hbb/priiloader/priiloader.zip)
2. In Priiloader, look for `System Menu Hacks`.
3. Turn on `Wiimmfi patch v4`.
4. Save and exit.

Now when you try to play a wii game online it will work.

![mario kart wii online](/images/blog/wii-online/kart-online.jpg)

### RiiConnect24

RiiConnect24 is a replacement for WiiConnect24 (the service for many channels that used the internet).

Many people have contributors to the project in many ways.

**Installing**

Again I suggest you follow the guide on [wii.guide](https://wii.guide/riiconnect24) because the process may change.

But here's a summery of the steps:

1. Download the [RiiConnect24 Patcher](https://github.com/RiiConnect24/RiiConnect24-Patcher/releases)
2. Use the patcher to get the required files on your SD card.
3. Use a tool like [Wii Mod Lite](https://github.com/RiiConnect24/Wii-Mod-Lite/releases) to install the WADs.
4. Optionally, change your DNS to the one provided by RiiConnect24.

That's it! You can now view the weather, news, vote on poll, download miis and more.

![weather channel online](/images/blog/wii-online/weather-online.jpg)
![news channel online](/images/blog/wii-online/news-online.jpg)
